review.reviewBody: Every dish was excellent. Tasty and authentic.
Good food! My baby girl really enjoys it.
Excellent quality dishes. Tasty and good portion.

After 45 minutes of waiting I get a call saying the famous chicken is sold out at 1130am. Don't put the dish in the menu if you're not willing to sell it without reservations. Horrible way of doing business
